Address.value: 42505 TENTH STREET WEST, LANCASTER, California, 93534-7059, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Simulations Plus Inc is engaged in the software industry. It develops and produces software for use in pharmaceutical research and for education, and provides consulting and contract research services to the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers software products for pharmaceutical research such as ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) Predictor is a computer program that takes molecular structures as inputs; MedChem Designer includes a small set of ADMET Predictor property predictions, allowing the chemist to modify molecular structures; MedChem Studio is a tool for medicinal and computational chemists for both data mining and for designing new drug-like molecules.
